code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileList=()=>{const[profiles,setProfiles]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProfiles=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/api/profiles');const data=await response.json();setProfiles(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching profiles:',error);}};fetchProfiles();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Profiles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:profiles.map(profile=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profiles/".concat(profile._id),children:profile.username})},profile._id))})]});};export default ProfileList;
